title: Who Do You Think This Is? Megadeth To Open For Mysterious Band They've Never Played With Before [News]
text:
Who Do You Think This Is? Megadeth to Open for Mysterious Band They've Never Played With Before The show will take place in the US later during the year, Dave Mustaine announces. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 7 hours ago 6 
Dave Mustaine revealed that Megadeth is set to perform as support band for a mysterious big act they've never played with in the past. 
Chatting with WRIF, the frontman noted (via Blabbermouth ): "Believe it or not, we've got some cool things going on for the States - two really great things. 
"We'll be heading out some part of the spring or summer, and then we just were told about an opportunity at the end of the year that really , really excited me. It's somebody I've never played with before that we're actually gonna be supporting. 
"They were so cool that we would step down from being a headliner to support this group." 
So, a band big enough to have Megadeth as support act, but also a band Megadeth never performed with. Who do you think it is?
